scripts.postinstall: concurrently "cd sat-api && npm install" "cd sat-spa && npm install" "cd sat-ui && npm install"
scripts.preview: concurrently -k "cd sat-api && npm run start" "cd sat-ui && npm run build && npm run start"
scripts.dev: concurrently -k "cd sat-api && npm run start" "cd sat-spa && npm run dev"
